name: reduce_night_time_electric_equipment_loads
display_name: Reduce Night Time Electric Equipment Loads

arguments.name: elec_load_def
arguments.units: schedules using this will be altered

arguments.name: fraction_value
arguments.display_name: Fractional Value for Night Time Load

arguments.name: apply_weekday
arguments.display_name: Apply Schedule Changes to Weekday and Default Profiles

arguments.name: start_weekday
arguments.display_name: Weekday/Default Time to Start Night Time Fraction

arguments.name: end_weekday
arguments.display_name: Weekday/Default Time to End Night Time Fraction

arguments.name: start_saturday
arguments.display_name: Saturday Time to Start Night Time Fraction

arguments.name: end_saturday
arguments.display_name: Saturday Time to End Night Time Fraction

arguments.name: start_sunday
arguments.display_name: Sunday Time to Start Night Time Fraction

arguments.name: end_sunday
arguments.display_name: Sunday Time to End Night Time Fraction

arguments.name: material_cost
arguments.display_name: Material and Installation Costs per Electric Equipment Quantity

arguments.name: om_cost
arguments.display_name: O & M Costs Costs per Electric Equipment Quantity

name_xml: Reduce Night Time Electric Equipment Loads
modeler_description: Make an array of space types to alter electric equipment schedules for. Clone and then edit the schedules. The rules will be edited based on the user arguments. Summer and winter design day profiles will not be altered. Quantity for cost is calculated by looking at number of instances and quantity. Currently cost is added to the building, but in a future version cost will be associated with the instances.
description: This measure lets you set the electric equipment schedule profile values for a specific time of day, and for specific days of the week.  This can be run across the entire model or a specific space type. Cost can be added per each equipment object.
